position.description_zh: 吸附位置，可选值为 bottom

offset-top.description: The distance from the top when the ceiling is raised, supporting 'px' 'vw' 'vh' 'rem' units, default px
offset-top.description_zh: 吸顶时与顶部的距离，支持 `px` `vw` `vh` `rem` 单位，默认 px

offset-bottom.description: The distance from the bottom when sucking the bottom, support 'px' 'vw' 'vh' 'rem' units, default px
offset-bottom.description_zh: 吸底时与底部的距离，支持 `px` `vw` `vh` `rem` 单位，默认 px

container.description_zh: 容器对应的 HTML 节点

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the ceiling status changes
events.description_zh: 当吸顶状态改变时触发
